detaileddescription.para: enum values to represent the Manual , continuous interrupt configuration modes and represents the interrupt status
enum to represent Ambient light sensor supported brightness configurations
enum to represent enabled or disabled of Sensor get or read operations
800 ms integration time(time taken for capturing lux intensity)
Out of Integration Time Supported Range
enum values to represent the supported integration time values by the ambient light sensor
enum values to represent the interrupt status
enum to represent MAX44009 supported register address

briefdescription.para: Delay function prototype.

memberdef.definition: typedef int8_t(* MAX44009_readReg)(uint8_t dev_addr, uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *data_p, uint8_t r_len)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint8_t dev_addr, uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *data_p, uint8_t r_len)
memberdef.name: MAX44009_readReg

briefdescription.para: Sensor register Read function prototype.

simplesect.para: int8_t 0 Success -1 Fail

memberdef.definition: typedef int8_t(* MAX44009_writeReg)(uint8_t dev_addr, uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *data_p, uint8_t wr_len)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint8_t dev_addr, uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *data_p, uint8_t wr_len)
memberdef.name: MAX44009_writeReg

briefdescription.para: Sensor register write function prototype.

simplesect.para: int8_t 0 Success -1 Fail

briefdescription.para: The function to initialize the ambient light sensor. It initializes and preserves the i2c address and i2c bus read , write functions for further communication between the sensor and the controller.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_Init

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK MAX44009 Light sensor initialization success.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to set the CDR value of the Configuration register Api to configure the desired photodiode current that goes to ADC.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_SetCdr

parameterdescription.para: CDR value(from the provided enum value)

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Setting cdr for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid CDR value.
In case of any other error refer MAX44009_GetConfigurationReg error codes.
reflects the configured value only if Manual mode is enabled
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to get the configured CDR value.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_GetCdr

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Getting cdr for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid CDR value.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to get the configuration register value.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_GetConfigurationReg

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Getting the configuration register value for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to set the integration time of the sensor.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_SetIntegrationTime

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Configuration of integration time for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
In case of any other error refer MAX44009_GetConfigurationReg error codes.
reflects the configured value only if Manual mode is enabled
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to get the configured integration time value.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_GetIntegrationTime

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Getting of integration time for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
In case of any other error refer MAX44009_GetConfigurationReg error codes.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to get the light sensor values in LUX.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_GetSensorData

parameterdescription.para: raw sensor data represented in the 16 bit output format [0 0 0 0 E3 E2 E1 E0 M7 M6 M5 M4 M3 M2 M1 M0] from [bit 15 to bit 0]. M7-M0:Mantissa and E3-E0:Exponent

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Getting the MAX44009 Light sensor value successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid sensor data.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to convert the Raw sensor value to Milli Lux.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_GetDataInMilliLux

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Converting the raw MAX44009 Light sensor value to Milli Lux successful.

RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.

briefdescription.para: Function used to set the threshold timer.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_SetThresholdTimer

parameterdescription.para: threshold timer value(100ms) that to be configured.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Setting the threshold timer for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: Function to get the threshold timer register value.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_GetThresholdTimer

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Getting the threshold timer for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: The function to set Continuous mode MAX44009_DISABLE_CONTINOUS_MOD(default mode): the IC measures lux intensity only once every 800ms regardless of integration time MAX44009_ENABLE_CONTINOUS_MODE : The IC continuously measures lux intensity. That is, as soon as one reading is finished, a new one begins. If integration time is 6.25ms, readings are taken every 6.25ms If integration time is 800ms,readings are taken every 800ms.

detaileddescription.para: The function to set Manual mode MAX44009_ENABLE_MANUAL_MODE : CDR, and TIM[2:0] bits can be programmed, MAX44009_DISABLE_MANUAL_MODE((default mode)) : CDR, TIM[2:0] bits are automatically determined by the internal autoranging circuitry of the IC.

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_SetContinousModeReg

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Setting the Continuous mode for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
In case of any other error refer MAX44009_GetConfigurationReg error codes.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_SetManualModeReg

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Setting the manual mode for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
In case of any other error refer MAX44009_GetConfigurationReg error codes.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).

xrefdescription.para: since version vxx.xx.xx, replaced by MAX44009_SetIntrptReg

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK Configuring the interrupt status for MAX44009 Light sensor successful.
RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM Invalid configuration parameter.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
